text: Manfred Ebert (6 December 1935 – 24 December 2003) was a German footballer who played for 1. FC Saarbrücken, FV Speyer and the Saarland national team as a forward. ==References== Category:1935 births Category:2003 deaths Category:German footballers Category:Saar footballers Category:Saarland international footballers Category:1. FC Saarbrücken players Category:FV Speyer players Category:Association football forwards
title: Manfred Ebert
